Dublin is the capital city of Ireland, located on the country’s east coast where the River Liffey flows into the sea. ğŸŒŠ It’s the largest city in Ireland and has been the country’s most important city for hundreds of years! ğŸ™ï¸

Where Is Dublin? ğŸ“ #

Dublin sits near the middle of Ireland’s eastern coastline. It’s like the heart of Ireland, with many important roads and railways connecting it to other parts of the country. ğŸš‚ The beautiful River Liffey runs right through the middle of the city before emptying into the Irish Sea. ğŸŒŠ

Stockholm is a beautiful city that sits on a collection of islands in Sweden. It’s the capital and largest city of Sweden, located in Northern Europe. Stockholm is a special place with lots of fascinating history, delicious food, and exciting things to see and do! ğŸŒŸ

Where in the World is Stockholm? ğŸŒ #

Stockholm is located in Sweden, which is part of Scandinavia in Northern Europe. The city sits at a special spot where Lake MÃ¤laren meets the Baltic Sea. What makes Stockholm super cool is that it’s built across 14 different islands that are all connected by 57 bridges! ğŸŒ‰ The exact location of Stockholm is 59.334591Â° north and 18.063240Â° east on your globe or map. This unique island layout gives Stockholm the nickname “Beauty on Water.” ğŸ’§

Where Is Seoul? ğŸ“ #

Seoul is located in the northwestern part of South Korea, quite close to the border with North Korea ğŸ—ºï¸. It sits along the Han River ğŸï¸, which divides the city into two halves. If you look at a map, you can find Seoul at these coordinates: 37.532600, 127.024612.

New York City, also known as NYC or “The Big Apple,” is a fascinating place full of skyscrapers ğŸ™ï¸, exciting attractions ğŸ¡, and diverse people. It’s one of the most famous cities in the world and has lots to discover! ğŸŒ

Where is New York City? ğŸ“ #

New York City is located in the northeastern part of the United States ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸, at the southern tip of New York State. The city sits where the Hudson and East rivers meet New York Bay ğŸŒŠ, creating one of the world’s largest natural harbors. The city is made up of five areas called boroughs: Manhattan, Brooklyn, the Bronx, Queens, and Staten Island. Most of New York City is actually built on three islands ğŸï¸ - Manhattan, Staten Island, and western Long Island.

florence, italy #

Florence is a beautiful historic city located in north-central Italy, in a region called Tuscany. Let’s explore this amazing place that’s full of art, history, and delicious food! ğŸ¨ğŸ

Where is Florence? ğŸ“ #

Florence sits on the banks of the River Arno, surrounded by pretty hills. It’s about 160 feet above sea level and serves as the capital city of Tuscany. If you look at a map of Italy, you’ll find Florence about 65 miles south of Bologna and 190 miles southeast of Milan. The city has coordinates of 43.769562, 11.255814, which are like its special address on Earth! ğŸŒğŸ—ºï¸

Where in the World is Reykjavik? ğŸŒ #

Reykjavik is located in the southwestern part of Iceland, sitting on the shores of FaxaflÃ³i bay ğŸŒŠ. Singapore is a small island city-state located in Southeast Asia, right at the southern tip of the Malay Peninsula. Even though it’s one of the 20 smallest countries in the world, Singapore is packed with amazing things to see and do! ğŸŒâœ¨

Where Is It? ğŸ“ #

Singapore sits just 85 miles north of the Equator and consists of one main diamond-shaped island plus about 60 tiny islets. It’s separated from Malaysia by the Straits of Johor to the north and from Indonesia by the Singapore Strait to the south. ğŸŒŠğŸ—ºï¸

Osaka, a bustling city in Japan ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ, is full of history ğŸ“œ, culture ğŸ, and excitement ğŸ‰. Located in the Kansai region on the island of Honshu, Osaka is the third-largest city in Japan, with a population of approximately 2.7 million people. Known for its friendly locals ğŸ˜„, delicious food ğŸœ, and vibrant entertainment districts ğŸ­, Osaka is often referred to as “Japan’s Kitchen” due to its rich culinary tradition. This article will introduce you to Osaka’s location ğŸŒ, one special sightseeing spot ğŸï¸, its language ğŸ—£ï¸ and food ğŸ½ï¸, a famous musician ğŸµ and scientist ğŸ”¬ from the city, and a fun fact about this fascinating place.

item.title: 014. London
item.description:
London, UK #

  • City: å€«æ•¦ (leon4 deon1)
  • Country: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ è‹±åœ‹ (jing1 gwok3)

London is the exciting capital city of England and the United Kingdom. Sitting in the southeast of England on the River Thames ğŸŒŠ (pronounced “Temz”), this bustling city is packed with history, culture, and fascinating sights that would make any young explorer’s eyes ğŸ‘€ widen with wonder!

Where is London? ğŸ“ #

London is located in the southeast part of England on the River Thames. The river flows right through the middle of the city ğŸŒ‡, dividing it into north and south parts. Long ago, people chose this spot to build London because it was the lowest point where they could build a bridge across the Thames. The city has grown over thousands of years from a small Roman settlement to one of the world’s most important cities today!

item.title: 015. Tehran
item.description:
Tehran, Iran #

  • City: å¾·é»‘è˜­ (dak1 hak1 laan4)
  • Country: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡· ä¼Šæœ— (ji1 long5)

Tehran, the vibrant capital of Iran, sits at the foot of the towering Alborz Mountains â›°ï¸. This bustling city blends ancient history ğŸº with modern energy âš¡, making it a fascinating place to explore!

Population and Growth ğŸ“ˆ #

Did you know that Tehran is home to almost 10 million people? As of 2025, the population is estimated at 9,730,000. That’s a lot of people! In fact, Tehran has grown tremendously over time. Back in 1950, only about 1 million people lived there. Today, Tehran is not only the largest city in Iran but also the 30th largest city in the world ğŸŒ.
